member.name: M:Insite.Dealers.Services.Handlers.Interfaces.IDealerProvider.FindDealers(System.Guid,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds dealers based on location, radius and name (optional). Provides a paging mechanism to pull the dealers in chunks.
member.param: Id of website to find associated dealers.
Latitude of the center point of the search area.
Longitude of the center point of the search area.
Distance from the center point in miles to the outer edge of the search area.
Name of the dealer to search for.
Page to pull from the matches.
Max number of rows to pull from the matches.
